channel.title: Cant remove saved username and password on client
channel.description: can anyone help me remove the saved username and password for my client when i load it up it saves my username and password and i want to let my friends play but i dont want to have to chnage my pass in the charater files and i cant find how to take that out of the client side of the code.

item.title: Cant remove saved username and password on client
item.dc:creator: @SurrealRSPS1 SurrealRSPS1
item.description:
@SurrealRSPS1 wrote:

Itâ€™s saved in the cache, in a notepad or .ini file or something like that. Just locate the cache in the C: drive or the user home area.
